short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 4K-AutoZoom sets the zoom level of a tab. 200% if it was maximized, 100% if it was sized back to a FHD window (or smaller).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Additionally, with the shortcut CTRL + UP you can toggle between a zoom of 150% and 100% (intended mainly for FHD windows).

This extension is intended for people who use a 4K screen and put 4 FHD windows on it. Sometimes, you need to maximize a window to see details. Then, this extension zooms to 200%. I use it all the time and hope you find it useful too.
